Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the regulation of non-tobacco smoking products, and to amend the fire code of the city of New York, and the New York city mechanical code, in relation to the operation of non-tobacco hookah establishments
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Regulation of non-tobacco smoking products, and to amend the fire code of NYC, and the NYC mechanical code, in relation to the operation of non-tobacco hookah establishments.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the sale of shisha.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the use of smokeless tobacco at sports arenas and recreational areas that issue tickets
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the use of smokeless tobacco at sports arenas and recreational areas that issue tickets.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring signage warning of the health risks associated with smoking shisha
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring signage warning of the health risks associated with smoking shisha.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the sale of non-tobacco smoking products to minors and young adults, and to repeal subdivision f of section 17-713 and section 17-714 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the sale of herbal cigarettes to individuals under eighteen years of age
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the sale of non-tobacco smoking products to minors and young adults, and the sale of herbal cigarettes to individuals under 18 years of age.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the regulation of non-tobacco smoking products, and to amend the fire code of the city of New York, and the New York city mechanical code, in relation to the operation of non-tobacco hookah establishments
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
